title: The Firm
occurrences: He reckons they're firm-handed and right up for a meet.
l'm serious. The Bex. The geezer that runs the firm.
Some old bollocks about knowing you lot were goin' firm-handed
We need a good firm together for this mob.
Millwall's firm and Portsmouth's firm. Top boys only.
than runnin' a firm with that lot under ya.
Bex and his West Ham firm shit 'emselves so they brought the gawers with 'em
You come and take us out with your top firm, then you can take us on tour.
All right. We'll see who's got the top firm.
What? Show them who's got the top firm. Yeah?
Have a look at this firm we got round us.
You think that l'm gonna stand behind you in a national firm?
l don't want to see you on the plot, l don't want to see you talking to any of my firm.
